content:
The men paid $ 5,000 for the fact that they will be waiting for them on the Tisza shore, on which they will swim to Hungary.

But the organizer of the crossing either hid the watercraft too well, or decided to save money.

About this casereported March 13State Border Service of Ukraine.

According to the department, after waiting for the darkness, men began to wade to Tisza. But the boat was not found there. Instead, he found a border outfit. Admin protocols are detained.

BeforeThe Armyinform reported5 schemes for evasion have been stopped in Ukraine.
title: At the border detained the evastors who bought an invisible boat
description: But the organizer of the crossing either too well hid the plastib, or decided ...
author: Army Inform
